resources.string: No WIFI connection established, first connect to proper network. \nTap screen to open settings.
First establish proper WIFI connection! \nTap on "WIFI connection status" label.
Main application target is wireless control of displayed presentation. \nIt is part of Engineering Thesis prepared by Patryk Łaś
Choose one of available presentation mode: presenting effect by effect or slide by slide. \nTap left/right edge or use proper swipe gesture to change current slide or effect to previous/next one.
Swipe left/right gesture to change current page. \nScroll up/down to scroll pdf file view.
